import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-client-register-update', templateUrl: './client-register-update.component.html', styleUrls: ['./client-register-update.component.css'], }) export class ClientRegisterUpdateComponent { constructor() {} registerForm = new FormGroup({ cpf: new FormControl('', Validators.required), nome: new FormControl('',Validators.required), telefone: new FormControl(0,Validators.required), endereco: new FormControl('',Validators.required), renda: new FormControl(0, Validators.required), }); cadastrar() { console.log(this.registerForm) } }
